pca.rule.autoTrade.name: autoTrade
pca.rule.autoTrade.desc: Use dispenser to auto trade with villager.
pca.rule.autoTrade.extra.0: If EMERALD_BLOCK under the dispenser, it will trade once.
pca.rule.autoTrade.extra.1: If DIAMOND_BLOCK under the dispenser, it will trade all.
pca.rule.autoTrade.extra.2: Trade offer depend on redStone power.
pca.rule.avoidAnvilTooExpensive.name: avoidAnvilTooExpensive
pca.rule.avoidAnvilTooExpensive.desc: Allow anvil level cost above 40 (If the client is not installed mod, it will be too expensive but can be used in practice).
pca.rule.creativePlayerNoDirectKillArmor: Creative Player No Direct Kill ArmorStand.
pca.rule.dispenserCollectXp.name: dispenserCollectXp
pca.rule.dispenserCollectXp.desc: Dispenser use bottle to collect xp.
pca.rule.dispenserFixIronGolem.name: dispenserFixIronGolem
pca.rule.emptyShulkerBoxStack.name: emptyShulkerBoxStack
pca.rule.emptyShulkerBoxStack.extra.0: Empty shulker boxes can stack in a player's inventory or hand.
pca.rule.emptyShulkerBoxStack.extra.1: But empty shulker boxes will not stack in other inventories, such as chests or hoppers.
pca.rule.flippingTotemOfUndying.name: flippingTotemOfUndying
pca.rule.flippingTotemOfUndying.desc: Players can flip and rotate blocks when holding Totem Of Undying.
pca.rule.flippingTotemOfUndying.extra.0: Doesn't cause block updates when rotated/flipped.
pca.rule.flippingTotemOfUndying.extra.1: When Totem Of Undying in main hand,  offhand is empty will flip block.
pca.rule.flippingTotemOfUndying.extra.2: When Totem Of Undying in main hand,  offhand is not empty, will place flipped block.
pca.rule.forceRestock.name: forceRestock
pca.rule.forceRestock.desc: Use spectral arrow to shoot villager to force restock.
pca.rule.gravestone.name: gravestone
pca.rule.pcaDebug.name: pcaDebug
pca.rule.pcaSyncPlayerEntity.name: pcaSyncPlayerEntity
pca.rule.pcaSyncPlayerEntity.desc: Which player entity can be sync.
pca.rule.pcaSyncPlayerEntity.extra.1: BOT: carpet bot will be sync.
pca.rule.pcaSyncPlayerEntity.extra.2: OPS: carpet bot will be sync, and op can sync everyone's player entity data.
pca.rule.pcaSyncPlayerEntity.extra.3: OPS_AND_SELF: carpet bot and self data will be sync, and op can sync everyone's player entity data.
pca.rule.pcaSyncPlayerEntity.extra.4: EVERYONE: everyone's player entity will be sync.
pca.rule.pcaSyncProtocol.name: pcaSyncProtocol
pca.rule.pcaSyncProtocol.desc: Support sync entity and blockEntity from server.
pca.rule.playerOperationLimiter.name: playerOperationLimiter
pca.rule.playerOperationLimiter.desc: One tick player can place 2 block, insta break 1 block, can't do it at the same tick.
pca.rule.playerSit.name: playerSit
pca.rule.playerSit.desc: Player can sit down when fast sneak 3 times.
pca.rule.potionRecycle.name: potionRecycle
pca.rule.potionRecycle.desc: Dispenser can clear potion to cauldron.
pca.rule.powerfulBoneMeal.name: powerfulBoneMeal
pca.rule.powerfulBoneMeal.desc: Allow use bone meal in cactus, sugar cane, chorus flower.
pca.rule.quickLeafDecay.name: quickLeafDecay
pca.rule.renewableNetheriteEquip.name: renewableNetheriteEquip
pca.rule.renewableNetheriteEquip.desc: Only in nether, throw the diamond equipment with 1 durability to lava fluid to get netherite equipment.
pca.rule.sleepingDuringTheDay.name: sleepingDuringTheDay
pca.rule.sleepingDuringTheDay.desc: World will switch to night when player sleep during the day.
pca.rule.spawnBiome.name: spawnBiome
pca.rule.spawnYMax.name: spawnYMax
pca.rule.spawnYMin.name: spawnYMin
pca.rule.superLead.name: superLead
pca.rule.superLead.desc: Leash villagers and mobs by lead.
pca.rule.trackItemPickupByPlayer.name: trackItemPickupByPlayer
pca.rule.trackItemPickupByPlayer.desc: When item pick up by player, item will freeze.
pca.rule.useDyeOnShulkerBox.name: useDyeOnShulkerBox
pca.rule.useDyeOnShulkerBox.desc: Dyes can be used on shulker boxes, empty potion will clean color.
pca.rule.villagersAttractedByEmeraldBloc: Villagers are attracted by emerald block.
pca.rule.xaeroWorldName.name: xaeroWorldName
pca.rule.xaeroWorldName.desc: set xaero world name to sync word id to xaerominimap, "#none" is disable.
